name: Posibility
description:
Is this a simple little game? You need to play as a monster, gain the opponent's ability through battle, improve your attributes, remove various obstacles, and finally defeat the leader.
It is better to eat without watching the strategy! !!
Basic operation:
"0000": Start a new game
"0001": Continue the game
"9999": Exit the game
"W": Move up (available for some characters)
"A": move left
"S": move down (available for some characters)
"D": move right
"J": Attack (automatically used by some characters)
"K": Jump (some characters are unavailable)
"I": View transformation list
"1"-"5": turn into a shortcut
